name: NSTouchBarItem
desc: A UI control shown in the Touch Bar on supported models of MacBook Pro.

items.name: init(identifier: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier)
items.desc: Instantiates a new NSTouchBarItem object with the specified initializer.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a new item from a storyboard or NIB file.

items.name: var identifier: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier
items.desc: The identifier for this item.

items.name: var visibilityPriority: NSTouchBarItem.Priority
items.desc: Determines which items are shown in a bar when space is limited.

items.name: struct NSTouchBarItem.Priority
items.desc: Priorities for the visibility of a Touch Bar item.

items.name: var isVisible: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that reflects whether or not the item is visible.

items.name: var customizationLabel: String
items.desc: The user-visible string identifying this item during bar customization.

items.name: var viewController: NSViewController?
items.desc: The view controller associated with this item.

items.name: var view: NSView?
items.desc: The view associated with this item.

items.name: class let touchBarAddDetailTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing additional detail for an item.

items.name: class let touchBarAddTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for creating a new item.

items.name: class let touchBarAlarmTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for setting or showing an alarm.

items.name: class let touchBarAudioInputMuteTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for muting audio input or denoting that audio input is muted.

items.name: class let touchBarAudioInputTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for denoting audio input.

items.name: class let touchBarAudioOutputMuteTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for muting audio output or for denoting that audio output is muted.

items.name: class let touchBarAudioOutputVolumeHighTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for setting the audio output volume to a high level, or for denoting that the audio is at the peak volume.

items.name: class let touchBarAudioOutputVolumeLowTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for setting the audio output volume to a low level, or for denoting that it is set to a low level.

items.name: class let touchBarAudioOutputVolumeMediumTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for setting the audio output volume to a medium level, or for denoting that it is set to a medium level.

items.name: class let touchBarAudioOutputVolumeOffTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for setting the audio output volume to silent, or for denoting that it is set to silent.

items.name: class let touchBarBookmarksTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing app-specific bookmarks.

items.name: class let touchBarColorPickerFillName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing a color picker so the user can select a fill color.

items.name: class let touchBarColorPickerFontName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing a color picker so the user can select a text color.

items.name: class let touchBarColorPickerStrokeName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing a color picker so the user can select a stroke color.

items.name: class let touchBarCommunicationAudioTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for initiating or denoting audio communication.

items.name: class let touchBarCommunicationVideoTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for initiating or denoting video communication.

items.name: class let touchBarComposeTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for opening a new document or view in edit mode.

items.name: class let touchBarDeleteTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for deleting the current or selected item.

items.name: class let touchBarDownloadTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for downloading an item.

items.name: class let touchBarEnterFullScreenTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for entering full screen mode.

items.name: class let touchBarExitFullScreenTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for exiting full screen mode.

items.name: class let touchBarFastForwardTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for moving forward through media playback or slides.

items.name: class let touchBarFolderTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for opening or representing a folder.

items.name: class let touchBarFolderCopyToTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for copying an item to a destination.

items.name: class let touchBarFolderMoveToTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for moving an item to a destination.

items.name: class let touchBarGetInfoTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing information about an item.

items.name: class let touchBarGoBackTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for returning to the previous screen or location.

items.name: class let touchBarGoDownTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for moving to the next item in a list.

items.name: class let touchBarGoForwardTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for moving to the next screen or location.

items.name: class let touchBarGoUpTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for moving to the previous item in a list.

items.name: class let touchBarHistoryTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing history information, such as recent downloads.

items.name: class let touchBarIconViewTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing items in an icon view.

items.name: class let touchBarListViewTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing items in a list view.

items.name: class let touchBarMailTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for creating an email message.

items.name: class let touchBarNewFolderTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for creating a new folder.

items.name: class let touchBarNewMessageTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for creating a new message, or for denoting the use of messaging.

items.name: class let touchBarOpenInBrowserTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for opening an item in the userâ€™s browser.

items.name: class let touchBarPauseTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for pausing media playback or slides.

items.name: class let touchBarPlayTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for starting or resuming playback of media or slides.

items.name: class let touchBarPlayPauseTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for toggling between playing and pausing media or slides.

items.name: class let touchBarPlayheadTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for denoting the current playback position within a timeline track.

items.name: class let touchBarQuickLookTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for opening an item in Quick Look.

items.name: class let touchBarRecordStartTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for starting recording.

items.name: class let touchBarRecordStopTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for stopping recording or stopping playback of media or slides.

items.name: class let touchBarRefreshTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for refreshing displayed data.

items.name: class let touchBarRewindTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for moving backwards through media or slides.

items.name: class let touchBarRotateLeftTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for rotating an item counterclockwise.

items.name: class let touchBarRotateRightTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for rotating an item clockwise.

items.name: class let touchBarSearchTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing a search field or for initiating a search.

items.name: class let touchBarShareTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for sharing content with others directly or via social media.

items.name: class let touchBarSidebarTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing a sidebar in the current view.

items.name: class let touchBarSkipBackTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for skipping to the previous chapter or location during media playback.

items.name: class let touchBarSkipToStartTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for skipping to the start of media playback.

items.name: class let touchBarSkipBack30SecondsTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for skipping back 30 seconds during media playback.

items.name: class let touchBarSkipBack15SecondsTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for skipping back 15 seconds during media playback.

items.name: class let touchBarSkipAhead15SecondsTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for skipping ahead 15 seconds during media playback.

items.name: class let touchBarSkipAhead30SecondsTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for skipping ahead 30 seconds during media playback.

items.name: class let touchBarSkipToEndTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for skipping to the end of media playback.

items.name: class let touchBarSkipAheadTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for skipping to the next chapter or location during media playback.

items.name: class let touchBarSlideshowTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for starting a slideshow.

items.name: class let touchBarTagIconTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for applying a tag to an item.

items.name: class let touchBarTextBoxTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for inserting a text box.

items.name: class let touchBarTextListTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for inserting a list or converting text to list form.

items.name: class let touchBarTextBoldTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for making selected text bold.

items.name: class let touchBarTextItalicTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for italicizing the selected text.

items.name: class let touchBarTextUnderlineTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for underlining text.

items.name: class let touchBarTextStrikethroughTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for striking through text.

items.name: class let touchBarTextJustifiedAlignTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for fully justifying text.

items.name: class let touchBarTextLeftAlignTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for aligning text to the left.

items.name: class let touchBarTextCenterAlignTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for centering text.

items.name: class let touchBarTextRightAlignTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for aligning text to the right.

items.name: class let touchBarUserTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing or representing user information.

items.name: class let touchBarUserAddTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for creating a new user account.

items.name: class let touchBarUserGroupTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for showing or representing a group of users.

items.name: class let touchBarVolumeUpTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for increasing the audio output volume.

items.name: class let touchBarVolumeDownTemplateName: String
items.desc: A template image for reducing the audio output volume.
